item.title: Remap Keys in Ubuntu [20.04]
item.description: Open Terminal using Ctrl + Alt + T or from the app launcher Navigate to the directory /usr/share/X11/xkb/symbols cd /usr/share/X11/xkb/symbols Edit the file named pc as an administrator or root user
